dirview



int Check(GtkTreeModel* model, GtkTreePath* path, GtkTreeIter* iter, void* data);
Checks a possible new entry in combobox to see if it already exists. If it does then sets CHECK.Bool to false and returns true stopping the treemodel.foreac() loop. Otherwise returns false indicating possible candidate can be added.

int SortFunciton(GtkTreeModel* model, GtkTreeIter* a, GtkTreeIter* b, gpointer user_data);
Sort the dir contents with folders up top Removes leading '.' and is case insensitive
